website_summaries.verdict: The best moisture analyzer to choose when you want the highest degree of accuracy in your results.
pros: Delivers highly accurate and reliable results in a short amount of time
Easy to use with one-button operation
Will automatically detect and identify several different conditions beyond dry skin
Good for repeated use for consistent results
cons: Can be difficult to take multiple readings in different areas

customer_reviews.title: IT'S ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Esthetician. I used this product for determining the degree of dryness on clients skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I love knowing what “hydrating” products are actually doing to my skin hydration- surprisingly, many products don’t actually increase the skin hydration level by much. My entire family uses this and it has been relatively consistent, works well, definitely a must have for skincare enthusiasts who want to quantitatively measure the effect of skincare products.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: I used it a couple times an loved it, it really showed my clients and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it a couple times an loved it, it really showed my clients and I about how good products can help hydrate you skin and then about 2 weeks ago someone broke into my car and stol my whole kit. I will be getting a new one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hope

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: A friend purchased and I like it so I purchased one for myself. I am definitely under moisturizing. Using the tool makes me take the time to tend to my face, neck, and décolletage.
customer_reviews.author: Reesa

customer_reviews.title: Good product, accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: I am using this device everyday. At first I was skeptical. But after several test readings I believe the reading makes sense. It helps me to know the hydration level of my skin and decide if a skin care product works for me.
customer_reviews.author: SammyEva

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my line of business! I just wish the beep was louder.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took a few tries to figure out how to use it without powering off to get readings for different areas of the face. Inexpensive tool that's a must have for estheticians.
customer_reviews.author: Snoflaxe

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It's easy to use and comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after I read an article in which Alicia Yoon mentioned it. I really like it. It's easy to use and comes with batteries. I like being able to monitor my skin's moisture levels.
customer_reviews.author: mestrand

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The introduction is very detailed and useful. And the equipment works well. Package speed is rapid. The box is clean and beautiful. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good value for purpose of the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a skin surface analyzing tool for medical device accessory development.
customer_reviews.author: Onrownnow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As an Esthetician, I use this every day in my facials. Great product. Highly accurate, and my clients love that I am using something high-Tech!!!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. It’s not absolutely necessary but it really helps me keep track of how dry my skin is and when I need to moisturize. I never realized how dry my legs compared to my face but now I moisturize all the time and my skin is very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Leia Manibusan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy to give you idea of your skins hydration
customer_reviews.author: C. Dreier

product_meta.title: Skin Moisture Analyzer Portable
product_meta.description: The skin analyzer reads an electrical resistance of your skin that will depend on the hydration. The dryer the skin, the higher the resistance. The skin full of moisture will have much lower resistance as water is excellent electricity conductor. The results on the same spot may vary, as they will depend on many factors - humidity, sweat glands activity, cosmetics, etc.
feature_bullets: Skin moisture analyzer is a portable device that uses Bioelectric impedance analysis (BIA) technology.
Skin moisture analyzer immediately and automatically detects skin conditions and displays the result on LCD screen as percentage numbers.
The best time to take a test is after you evening make up removal and drying the face.
After applying the night cream you may repeat the test and see how good your usual moisturizer works.
